sql-case.value: explain extended select 10 % 7, 10 mod 7, 10 div 3
explain partitions select 1
EXPLAIN SELECT 1 as a
EXPLAIN UPDATE t_order SET status = 'finished'
EXPLAIN INSERT INTO t_order (order_id, user_id, status) VALUES (1, 1, 'insert')
EXPLAIN DELETE FROM t_order WHERE status='init'
EXPLAIN SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i USING(order_id) WHERE o.order_id = 10
EXPLAIN CREATE TABLE t_order_new WITH (DISTRIBUTION = HASH(product_key), CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX, PARTITION (order_date RANGE RIGHT FOR VALUES (20000101,20010101))) AS SELECT * FROM t_order

EXPLAIN CREATE TABLE t_order_new (order_id_new, user_id_new) WITH (DISTRIBUTION = HASH(product_key), CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX, PARTITION (order_date RANGE RIGHT FOR VALUES (20000101,20010101))) AS SELECT order_id, user_id FROM t_order
EXPLAIN CREATE REMOTE TABLE t_order_new AT ('Data Source = ds_0, 3306; User ID = ROOT; Password = 123456;') AS SELECT i.* FROM t_order_item i JOIN t_order o ON i.order_id = o.order_id
EXPLAIN ANALYZE SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id > 8
EXPLAIN ANALYZE FORMAT = TREE SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id > 8
EXPLAIN ANALYZE DELETE FROM t_order
EXPLAIN ANALYZE DELETE t1 FROM t_order t1, t_order t2 WHERE t1.x = t2.x + 1
EXPLAIN ANALYZE UPDATE t_order SET id = 1
EXPLAIN ANALYZE INSERT INTO t_order (order_id) VALUES(1)
EXPLAIN TABLE t_order ORDER BY order_id LIMIT 1 OFFSET 2
DESC tableName
DESC tableName colName
DESC tableName ___
DESC tableName `u%`
DESCRIBE tableName
DESCRIBE tableName colName
DESC tableName ___
DESC tableName `u%`
EXPLAIN (ANALYZE, COSTS OFF, SUMMARY OFF, TIMING OFF) CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW matview_schema.mv_withdata2 (a) AS SELECT generate_series(1, 10) WITH DATA;
EXPLAIN (ANALYZE, COSTS OFF, SUMMARY OFF, TIMING OFF) CREATE MATERIALIZED VIEW matview_schema.mv_nodata2 (a) AS SELECT generate_series(1, 10) WITH NO DATA;
EXPLAIN PERFORMANCE SELECT 1
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT length.item_id password FROM t_order_item length where length.item_id = 1;
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT i.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i USING(order_id) WHERE o.order_id = 10
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id > 8
EXPLAIN PLAN SET STATEMENT_ID = 'select1' FOR SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id > 8
EXPLAIN PLAN INTO t_order FOR SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id > 8
EXPLAIN PLAN INTO t_order@t_database.test_domain_name FOR SELECT * FROM t_order WHERE order_id > 8
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR UPDATE t_order SET status = 'finished'
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR UPDATE t_order SET id = 1
EXPLAIN PLAN SET STATEMENT_ID = 'update1' FOR UPDATE t_order SET id = 1
EXPLAIN PLAN INTO t_order FOR UPDATE t_order SET id = 1
EXPLAIN PLAN INTO t_order@t_database.test_domain_name FOR UPDATE t_order SET id = 1
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR INSERT INTO t_order (order_id, user_id, status) VALUES (1, 1, 'insert')
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR INSERT INTO t_order (order_id) VALUES(1)
EXPLAIN PLAN SET STATEMENT_ID = 'insert1' FOR INSERT INTO t_order (order_id) VALUES(1)
EXPLAIN PLAN INTO t_order FOR INSERT INTO t_order (order_id) VALUES(1)
EXPLAIN PLAN INTO t_order@t_database.test_domain_name FOR INSERT INTO t_order (order_id) VALUES(1)
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR DELETE FROM t_order WHERE status='init'
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR DELETE FROM t_order
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR DELETE FROM t_order WHERE t_order.x = 1
EXPLAIN PLAN SET STATEMENT_ID = 'insert1' FOR DELETE FROM t_order WHERE t_order.x = 1
EXPLAIN PLAN INTO t_order FOR DELETE FROM t_order WHERE t_order.x = 1
EXPLAIN PLAN INTO t_order@t_database.test_domain_name FOR DELETE FROM t_order WHERE t_order.x = 1
EXPLAIN PLAN SET STATEMENT_ID = 'st1' INTO my_plan_table FOR SELECT last_name FROM employees
EXPLAIN PLAN SET STATEMENT_ID = 'Test 2' INTO plan_table FOR (SELECT /*+ LEADING(E@SEL$2 D@SEL$2 T@SEL$1) */ * FROM t, v WHERE t.department_id = v.department_id)
EXPLAIN PLAN SET STATEMENT_ID = 'Test 1' INTO plan_table FOR (SELECT /*+ LEADING(v.e v.d t) */ * FROM t, v WHERE t.department_id = v.department_id)
EXPLAIN PLAN SET STATEMENT_ID = 'Raise in Tokyo' INTO plan_table FOR UPDATE employees SET salary = salary * 1.10 WHERE department_id = (SELECT department_id FROM departments WHERE location_id = 1700)

EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT country, prod, year, sales FROM sales_view WHERE country IN ('Italy', 'Japan') MODEL UNIQUE DIMENSION PARTITION BY (country) DIMENSION BY (prod, year) MEASURES (sale sales) RULES UPSERT (sales['Bounce', 2003] = AVG(sales)[ANY, 2002] * 1.24, sales[prod <> 'Bounce', 2003] = sales['Bounce', 2003] * 0.25)
/*FORCE_IMCI_NODES*/ explain select /*+ SET_VAR(cost_threshold_for_imci=0) */ * from t_order
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT t.calendar_month_desc, SUM(s.amount_sold) FROM sales s, times t WHERE s.time_id = t.time_id GROUP BY t.calendar_month_desc
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT SUM(amount_sold) FROM sales WHERE TO_CHAR(time_id,'yyyy') = '2000'
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT SUM(quantity_sold) FROM sales WHERE time_id = TO_TIMESTAMP('1-jan-2000', 'dd-mon-yyyy')
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT * FROM sh.customers WHERE cust_city='Los Angeles' AND cust_state_province='CA'
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT * FROM emp_range;
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT * FROM emp_comp;
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR select /*+ result_cache */ deptno, avg(sal) from emp group by deptno;
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT * FROM v_emp_job_history;
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT * FROM emp_comp WHERE department_id = 20;
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT * FROM emp_range WHERE hire_date < TO_DATE('1-JAN-1992','DD-MON-YYYY');
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT * FROM emp_range WHERE hire_date >= TO_DATE('1-JAN-1996','DD-MON-YYYY');

EXPLAIN PLAN FOR SELECT XMLQuery('/PurchaseOrder/LineItems/LineItem' PASSING OBJECT_VALUE RETURNING CONTENT) FROM po_clob WHERE XMLExists('/PurchaseOrder/LineItems/LineItem [ora:contains(Description, "Picnic") > 0]' PASSING OBJECT_VALUE) AND XMLExists('/PurchaseOrder[User="SBELL"]' PASSING OBJECT_VALUE);
